Explore your future ++ Audi Ingolstadt is hosting a #CareerInformationDay on May 10th, offering a detailed overview of our diverse #apprenticeship and #DualStudy opportunities.   Participants will also have the exclusive chance to see the iconic Audi S1 #Hoonitron from Ken Block's #Electrikhana. Join us to learn more about building your career with Audi.​ ​ Date: ​ May 10th, 2025 | 9:00 - 14:00 CEST ​ ​ Venue: ​ Audi Bildungszentrum​ Hindemithstraße 27​ 85057 Ingolstadt​ ​ ​#AudiCareers​ --------------------​ The vehicle shown is a concept vehicle that is not available as a production model.

Emilia's journey at Audi ++ This insightful #interview shares Emilia's experience as a first-year Manufacturing Mechanic apprentice at Audi.   Discover her enthusiasm for continuously learning new techniques and exploring various departments within the company.   Emilia reveals what ignited her passion for this path, what she values most about her #apprenticeship, and the unique team spirit she's found at Audi – the very reasons she now looks forward to her workday.​ ​ Learn how Emilia transitioned from initial uncertainty to finding her ideal #career. Read her story to gain valuable perspectives on vocational training in the automotive industry and the supportive culture at Audi: https://lnkd.in/en5dqdbr ​ #AudiCareers

Welcome to the family ++ Audi proudly presents the A6 Avant e-hybrid quattro and the A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro. The first plug-in hybrids to join the A6 model series, these newcomers impress with their efficiency, sportiness, and comfort.   Swipe through the pictures and get to know the new Audi A6 e-hybrids in detail.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6 #hybrid   -------------------- Audi A6 Avant e-hybrid quattro 220 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.8–2.2 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.2–15.2 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 65–51 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.6–6.7 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F–E Audi A6 Avant e-hybrid quattro 270 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.9–2.4 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.2–15.4 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 65–54 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.7–6.9 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F Audi A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro 220 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.8–2.1 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.0–15.0 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 63–48 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.5–6.5 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F–E Audi A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro 270 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.8–2.2 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.0–15.2 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 63–51 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.5–6.7 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F–E

Sportiness meets efficiency ++ The Audi A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro and the Audi A6 Avant e-hybrid quattro expand the A6 model series in style.   Let’s answer the burning question first: both Avant and Sedan have an all-electric range of 106 kilometers, regardless of the power level chosen. 220 and 270 kW are available.   Efficiency and performance are increased thanks to the smart recuperation strategy and intelligent hybrid management. All-wheel steering as standard provides an even more dynamic driving experience.   What’s your style – Avant or Sedan? Tell us in the comments!  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6 #hybrid -------------------- Audi A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro 220 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.8–2.1 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.0–15.0 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 63–48 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.5–6.5 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F–E Audi A6 Sedan e-hybrid quattro 270 kW: Fuel consumption (weighted combined): 2.8–2.2 l/100 km; power consumption (weighted combined): 16.0–15.2 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (weighted combined): 63–51 g/km; CO₂ class (weighted combined): B; fuel consumption with discharged battery (combined): 7.5–6.7 l/100 km; CO₂ class with discharged battery: F–E

Focus on #CameraSystems ++ They must recognize traffic signs, traffic jams and other road users at lightning speed to anticipate dangerous situations at an early stage.  #AudiCareers #DrivenByTech -------------------- Assistance systems can only support the driver in performing the driving task within their respective system limits. The responsibility and necessary attention for managing the driving task always remain with the driver.​

Predictive, fast, intuitive technology enhances the driving experience for modern users ++  Lissi Lanz combines these three qualities both with her job as a component manager for the #FrontCamera and with her passion for mountain biking.  On the test track, she regularly checks the camera functions on the various Audi models. After work, it's off to the mountain bike trail with the same foresight.    #AudiCareers #DrivenByTech​

High five for Audi at Auto Shanghai ++ One of the world’s largest auto shows is on and Audi is on stage too.  Together with our partners SAIC and FAW, we are excited to show 19 market specific models to the public. Five are debuting. Among them: Our brand new Audi A6L e-tron and the first production vehicle from our new sister brand, AUDI. The AUDI E5 Sportback is designed and tailored to customers in China.  At our booth in Shanghai, immersive digital experiences playfully bring the new models’ features to life.   Swipe through the pictures to see the Auto Shanghai highlights.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #China #AutoShanghai

What is it? ++​  The job you are looking at here promotes individual strengths and makes targeted use of them. Communication takes place in programming languages, among other things, and moves even the largest machines at Audi with perfection. Another hint: in this image, the welding caps are being changed. ​ ​ Do you know which job this is?​ 👏 Audi dual Mechanical Engineering, Virtual Engineering​ ❤️ Dual Master Data science​ 💡Apprenticeship Mechatronics Technician​ ​ #AudiCareers #WhatsIsIt #JobsAtAudi

Gearing up for the biggest show in town ++ One of the world’s most important yearly auto shows is almost here: Auto Shanghai 2025 will run from April 23 to May 2. Together with our partners FAW and SAIC, we are set to showcase 19 market-specific models, including numerous premieres.  Excitement is mounting for the Audi A6L e-tron, Audi A5L, Audi A5L Sportback, and Audi Q5L to make their debuts. All eyes will also be on the AUDI E5 Sportback – the very first production model from our new sister brand AUDI for China. Taking the stage just six months after the AUDI brand was launched, the striking all-electric Sportback is sure to create a buzz in Shanghai.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6 #AudiA5 #AudiQ5 #AUDIE5 #China #AutoShanghai

Sleek, smooth, sophisticated. ++ Elevate your business-class experience with the all-new Audi A6 Sedan.   The new A6 Sedan impresses with its prestigious #design and outstanding #aerodynamics. Thanks to the new mild-hybrid technology MHEV plus, all-wheel steering, and adaptive air suspension, it is the perfect touring companion and go-to for every day.    Swipe through to discover more about the new sixth-generation Audi A6 Sedan.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6 -------------------- Audi A6 Sedan TFSI quattro 270 kW: Combined fuel consumption in l/100 km: 7.8–6.7 (30.2–35.1 mpg); combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 177–153 (284.9–246.2 g/mi); CO₂ class: G–E Audi A6 Sedan edition one TFSI quattro 270 kW: Combined power consumption in kWh/100 km: 7.7–7.2 (30.5–32.7 mpg); combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 174–163 (280.0–262.3 g/mi); CO₂ class: F

Elegance, the Audi way ++ Step into the future of business class with the all-new A6 Sedan. “With its clear and functional body, it combines elegance with sportiness and sets standards in design and aerodynamics,” says Audi #CEO Gernot Döllner.   The new Audi A6 Sedan is boasting an impressive drag coefficient of just 0.23 – the best for a combustion-engine production model in Audi history!  It features the mild hybrid technology MHEV plus that enhances efficiency and performance. Designed for both everyday and long-distance journeys.  Ready to elevate your driving experience? Discover more about the new sixth-generation Audi A6 Sedan in the gallery.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6    -------------------- Audi A6 Sedan TFSI quattro 270 kW: Combined fuel consumption in l/100 km: 7.8–6.7 (30.2–35.1 mpg); combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 177–153 (284.9–246.2 g/mi); CO₂ class: G–E Audi A6 Sedan edition one TFSI quattro 270 kW: Combined power consumption in kWh/100 km: 7.7–7.2 (30.5–32.7 mpg); combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 174–163 (280.0–262.3 g/mi); CO₂ class: F

Always focused, with an advanced, forward-thinking and keen eye for innovative solutions ++ Lissi Lanz is the component manager for the #FrontCamera at Audi and has the future of automated driving firmly in her sights. #CameraSystems are designed to recognize traffic signs, traffic jams or other road users as quickly as possible. This generates a large amount of #data that needs to be brought together. The aim is to anticipate hazardous situations and ensure a reliable journey. Behind this is a large #team at Audi that, like Lissi, is working on further developing our camera systems.​ ​ What is important to you when processing large amounts of data?  #AudiCareers #DrivenByTech​ -------------------- Assistance systems can only support the driver in performing the driving task within their respective system limits. The responsibility and necessary attention for managing the driving task always remain with the driver.

Inspiring the Next Generation of Innovators ++ The 'Werkstatt für junge Technik-Talente' offers engaging, hands-on experiences in collaboration with the 'Faszination Technik' association.   These workshops provide a platform for young individuals to explore their #creativity and develop foundational skills in various technical domains. The kids can engage in activities like building model vehicles and navigating robotic challenges. These offer a tangible introduction to #engineering principles and #technological concepts and allow them to experience technological innovation.  #AudiCareers #AudiForumNeckarsulm​

Welcoming new faces to the team ++ A group of new #interns join us, bringing with them new ideas and energy. We look forward to a mutually enriching experience filled with valuable insights and #growth. ​ ​ Meet our new interns and say hello to the bright minds joining our team for their #internship.​ ​ #AudiCareers

Dream it, design it ++ From exclusive paint finishes to selected fabrics and wheels, the possibilities are endless. Elevate your driving experience by designing a car that reflects your personal style and preferences. With the all-new A6 Avant, Audi exclusive clients have many different options to customize a truly unique vehicle.     Some of these are part of the regular options list that includes two exterior variants, eleven colors, and numerous wheels in dimensions between 18 and 21 inches.   In the spacious and modern interior, there are almost no limits to customization. With a 14.5-inch touch display, optional front passenger display, normal, sport, or sport plus seats, Audi exclusive fulfills almost every wish. The generous trunk provides enough space for long vacations as well as outstanding suitability for everyday use. A switchable-transparency panoramic glass roof spans almost the entire cockpit and rear seat – great views guaranteed.   #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiExclusive #AudiA6    -------------------- Audi A6 Avant TFSI quattro 270 kW: Combined fuel consumption in l/100 km: 7.8-7.3; CO₂ emissions combined in g/km: 178-166; CO₂ class: G-F

First-class travel ++ The all-new A6 Avant has a dynamic silhouette with a long wheelbase, large wheels, and a sculpted body, creating the perfect synthesis of sportiness and comfort.   The new A6 Avant draws its performance and efficiency in part from its mild hybrid technology – at Audi we call it MHEV plus. It makes partially electric driving possible and reduces CO₂ emissions. For example, when parking or in stop-and-go traffic, the A6 Avant runs purely on the powertrain generator. When overtaking, the system delivers an additional 18 kW (24 PS) and 230 Nm of torque and also allows the vehicle to recover energy.   The A6 Avant offers optional adaptive air suspension and all-wheel steering, which ensures a comfortable ride and dynamic handling in perfect harmony – for outstanding ride quality and a typically Audi driving experience.   What are your thoughts on the all-new Audi A6 Avant?  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA6 -------------------- Audi A6 Avant TDI quattro: Combined fuel consumption in l/100 km: 5.9-5.1; CO₂ emissions combined in g/km: 155-135; CO₂ class: E-D

The best of both worlds ++ Welcome the new Audi A5 e-hybrid quattro models.  They come in two power levels but always with a large high-voltage battery and an intelligent operating strategy for an electric range of up to 110 kilometers – the new Audi A5 plug-in hybrids perfectly balance flexibility, efficiency, and performance. With up to 270 kilowatts of total output and quattro all-wheel drive, they deliver a dynamic drive while maximizing electric range for everyday journeys.   Alongside the combustion-engine version, Audi is offering two plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) models for the A5 series for the first time. To make the new PHEVs even more recognizable, we are introducing the technology designation “e-hybrid”.    #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiA5 #hybrid

A striking figure from every angle ++ The new Audi Q5 features lighting design and technology that you simply have to experience.    At the front, the digital signatures in the daytime running lights ensure a high recognition value. And at the back, the second-generation digital OLED rear lights with active digital light signature guarantee visibility on the road.   The Q5 is part of the Audi model initiative which started in 2024 and will have us launch more than 20 new models by the end of 2025.   #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiQ5  --------------------  Audi SQ5 Sportback: Combined fuel consumption in l/100 km: 8.8–8.1; combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 199–184; CO₂ class: G

The perfect companion for all of life’s journeys ++ The third generation of the Audi Q5 is a true all-rounder.  One reason for this is the air suspension with adaptive damper control. This feature allows you to slightly lower the vehicle to make loading heavy objects more convenient.   The easily adjustable rear seat bench is also a real plus point: you can move it forwards and change its angle. This increases the trunk volume to as much as 1,473 liters (52 cu ft), depending on the model variant.   The interior of the new Audi Q5 also impresses with a large storage compartment under the center armrest plus numerous smaller storage areas for everyday items.  The Q5 is part of the Audi model initiative which started in 2024 and will have us launch more than 20 new models by the end of 2025.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiQ5 -------------------- Audi Q5 SUV: Fuel consumption (combined): 7.9-5.9 l/100 km;  CO₂ emissions (combined): 180-148 g/km; CO₂ class: G-E    Audi Q5 SUV TFSI quattro: Fuel consumption (combined): 7.9-6.9 l/100 km; CO₂ emissions (combined): 180-156 g/km; CO₂ class: G-F

Girls'Day at Audi ++ A day full of innovation.​ Yesterday, we opened our doors and introduced numerous schoolgirls to the fascinating world of the #AutomotiveIndustry. With exciting hands-on activities in the #STEM field and inspiring presentations at our sites in Ingolstadt and Neckarsulm, the participants were able to experience first-hand what Audi is all about.​  Immerse yourself in the highlights of this special day and discover the great opportunities that Audi offers. ​ ​ #AudiCareers #GirlsDay

Your chance to become a part of the legend ++ Our race cars have written motorsport history. Thanks to Audi Sport racing legends, thoroughbreds like these from Le Mans and the DTM are available for purchase. Carefully rebuilt and thoroughly inspected.  Kicking things off with two special cars: an Audi R18 e-tron quattro and Audi RS 5 DTM. This R18 chassis won the FIA WEC’s 6 Hours of Spa in 2012, while the RS 5 DTM was victorious at the 2015 DTM season finale with Timo Scheider. The sales phase has begun for both of them.  We’ve clinched victories at Le Mans and championship titles in the DTM with these types of racing cars. The winning examples from this era remain in our vehicle collection – looked after, kept running and used at events by Audi Tradition.  Audi Sport racing legends will be on display at three classic events in the coming months: the Jim Clark Revival, Le Mans Classic and Goodwood Festival of Speed.  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiSport #motorsport #news

Love is not only in the air – it’s also in your car ++ At Audi we celebrate our love for cars every day. What Audi model captures your heart?  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #AudiS5 #AudiRS3 #Q6etron #ThisIsAudi

A master of aerodynamics ++ The new Audi A6 e-tron is the most aerodynamic Audi of all time. With a new record under its belt, the Sportback takes the lead in its segment, while the Avant ranks among the top in its body class. Both models demonstrate the Audi commitment to seamlessly blending form and function.    How have the engineers at Audi achieved this? Here are a few key points:    •  Air curtains at the front improve airflow around the wheels.  •  A controllable cool-air intake under the Singleframe ensures that air can flow around this zone with minimal loss.  •  The underbody is largely finished and includes many optimizations such as on the wheel spoilers and battery panels.  •  Lateral breakaway edges at the rear enable a clearly defined flow stall.  •  And finally, on the Sedan, the low roof spoiler helps create a small wake behind the car.   #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #A6etron #ThisIsAudi #eMobility  --------------------  Audi S6 Sportback e-tron: Electric power consumption (combined): 16.7–15.7 kWh/100 km; CO₂ emissions (combined): 0 g/km; CO₂ class: A

Fully charged and ready to roam ++ Meet the sleek design, innovative features, human-centric interior and showstopping panoramic glass roof of the fully electric Audi A6 Sportback e-tron. Buckle up and get ready to explore.​  ​#Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #A6etron #ThisIsAudi #eMobility​ ---------- Audi A6 Sportback e-tron performance: Combined electric power consumption in kWh/100 km: 15.9-14.0; combined CO₂ emissions in g/km: 0. CO₂ class: A. Optional equipment available at an extra charge.

The greater the range, the greater the freedom ++ With a range of up to 423 km, the new Q4 40 e-tron can more than handle the demands of everyday life. 24 minutes is all the HV battery needs to charge from 10 to 80 percent – thanks to a DC charging capacity of 165 kW. And the Q4 40 e-tron can recharge for up to 155 km in just ten minutes.  For the first time, the series features a predictive maintenance reminder. The myAudi app shows a color-coded summary of the vehicle’s current condition and gives a clear overview of the parts that need servicing. If the driver wishes, the designated dealer can get in touch to arrange a service appointment. Manual battery preconditioning makes the charging process even more efficient.  What do you think of the new Q4 40 e-tron? Tell us in the comments!  #Audi #VorsprungDurchTechnik #Q4etron #ThisIsAudi #eMobility

Oliver Taruttis developed an exclusive #innovation for the Audi Sport body shop. ++ The new process called Agile Shimming was part of his final thesis and has now been successfully in use for a year. ​ Shimming is a standardized process that is used to adjust the gap dimensions of bodywork elements to an accuracy of a tenth of a millimetre and was previously carried out manually. Now Agile Shimming automates this quality process.​ ​ We're proud of the strong culture of innovation at Audi.​ ​ #AudiCareers #technology
